com.hc.blockchain.service.wallet

接口 IEthereumTransactionService


  • public interface IEthereumTransactionService
    接口IEthereumTransactionService以太币转账服务层接口

    主要包括以太币转账

    从以下版本开始:
    2018/11/26 11:31
    另请参阅:
    EthereumTransactionServiceImpl

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      com.hc.blockchain.dto.output.TransactionOutput transfer(com.hc.blockchain.dto.input.EthereumTransactionInput input, byte chainID)
      以太币转账接口 EthereumTransactionInput input = new EthereumTransactionInput(); // 1.默认账户from转出 String from = "0x4a85bcca41b6414e0c140261edf376ada8d9a68f"; // 2.默认账户to转入 string to = "0x748D0D20624084401cd7904847A8e6b7Daf60A48"; // 3.金额 单位ether String amount = "1"; input.setAmount(amount); input.setFrom(from); input.setTo(to); // 21000固定 input.setGasLimit("21000"); // 单位Gwei String gasPrice = "3"; input.setGasPrice(gasPrice); input.setKeystore("{\"address\":\"4a85bcca41b6414e0c140261edf376ada8d9a68f\", \"id\":\"8dfa50ea-ace7-4e3d-abbb-e6851e9745d3\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"4d810ddbff76afa9f6a729429cbee8665c3d3a505309d9b79b29d6ae45bf1727\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f74084b7352ea9635c0528be824591ae\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"6fab03d958268ced7d8abb964119e5cf94851f26a57dfd65ba1f076f40f6dd5d\"},\"mac\":\"48f94954f9339d6ff2a0acd80536128a32bddb5b26d5a8f7291e5cf159cbb5ce\"}}"); input.setPassword("123456789"); // 4.执行转账 测试使用chainID:3 TransactionOutput output = service.transfer(input,ChainId.ROPSTEN);

    • 方法详细资料

      • transfer

        com.hc.blockchain.dto.output.TransactionOutput transfer(com.hc.blockchain.dto.input.EthereumTransactionInput input,
                                                        byte chainID)

        以太币转账接口

             
 EthereumTransactionInput input = new EthereumTransactionInput();
 // 1.默认账户from转出
 String from = "0x4a85bcca41b6414e0c140261edf376ada8d9a68f";
 // 2.默认账户to转入
 string to = "0x748D0D20624084401cd7904847A8e6b7Daf60A48";
 // 3.金额 单位ether
 String amount = "1";
 input.setAmount(amount);
 input.setFrom(from);
 input.setTo(to);
 // 21000固定
 input.setGasLimit("21000");
 // 单位Gwei
 String gasPrice = "3";
 input.setGasPrice(gasPrice);
 input.setKeystore("{\"address\":\"4a85bcca41b6414e0c140261edf376ada8d9a68f\",
 \"id\":\"8dfa50ea-ace7-4e3d-abbb-e6851e9745d3\",\"version\":3,\"crypto\":{\"cipher\":\"aes-128-ctr\",\"ciphertext\":\"4d810ddbff76afa9f6a729429cbee8665c3d3a505309d9b79b29d6ae45bf1727\",\"cipherparams\":{\"iv\":\"f74084b7352ea9635c0528be824591ae\"},\"kdf\":\"scrypt\",\"kdfparams\":{\"dklen\":32,\"n\":4096,\"p\":6,\"r\":8,\"salt\":\"6fab03d958268ced7d8abb964119e5cf94851f26a57dfd65ba1f076f40f6dd5d\"},\"mac\":\"48f94954f9339d6ff2a0acd80536128a32bddb5b26d5a8f7291e5cf159cbb5ce\"}}");
 input.setPassword("123456789");
 // 4.执行转账 测试使用chainID:3
 TransactionOutput output = service.transfer(input,ChainId.ROPSTEN);
        参数:
        input - 钱包入参对象 EthereumTransactionInput
        chainID - 网络类型 3:测试网 1:主网
        返回:
        TransactionOutput
        另请参阅:
        ChainId, TransactionOutput, EthereumTransactionInput
